meanings.sent1: She upflung the ball into the air.
meanings.sent2: The acrobat upflung herself high above the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey upflung the banana peel onto the unsuspecting zookeeper.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were upflung into the vast expanse of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The kite was upflung by the strong gust of wind, soaring effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The upflung branches of the tree reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The upflung flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The upflung eyebrows of the surprised child added to his expression of shock.
meanings.sent4: The upflung mountains stood majestically against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The upflung sword gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of victory.
